snippet: Police are warning that Apple’s mapping app is stranding drivers headed to the southern city of Mildura in the middle of a remote national park.
abstract: Australian police warn that error in Apple's Maps service has been stranding drivers headed for southern city of Mildura in middle of Murray-Sunset National Park, forcing police to rescue them.
lead_paragraph: Police are warning that Apple’s mapping app is stranding drivers headed to the southern city of Mildura in the middle of a remote national park.

headline.seo: IPhone Leads Drivers to Middle of Nowhere in Australia
headline.main: IPhone Leads Drivers to Middle of Nowhere in Australia
